title: UCSF-CAPRA Score for Prostate Cancer Risk
desc: The UCSF-CAPRA (Cancer of the Prostate Risk Assessment) Score predicts outcomes of patients post-treatment for prostate cancer.

orgreference.text: Cooperberg MR, Broering JM, Carroll PR. Risk Assessment for Prostate Cancer Metastasis and Mortality at the Time of Diagnosis. JNCI Journal of the National Cancer Institute. 2009;101(12):878-887. doi:10.1093/jnci/djp122.
